channel.title: Sofamecca . Free Music Download
channel.itunes:author: SOFAMECCA
channel.description: Listen to a FREE sampler of Sofamecca's NEW album 'Children Dust' available now through iTunes. During the release of 'Children Dust' we are giving away songs from Sofamecca's album 'Sofa Mecca' for FREE to iTunes subscribers, direct from this Podcast. Just subscribe to the Podcast, download and listen. You can also preview a sampler of Sofamecca's critically acclaimed album 'Commuters' also available from iTunes.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Download Sofamecca music for FREE! New album 'Children Dust' out now!
channel.itunes:summary: Listen to a FREE sampler of Sofamecca's NEW album 'Children Dust' available now through iTunes. During the release of 'Children Dust' we are giving away songs from Sofamecca's album 'Sofa Mecca' for FREE to iTunes subscribers, direct from this Podcast. Just subscribe to the Podcast, download and listen. You can also preview a sampler of Sofamecca's critically acclaimed album 'Commuters' also available from iTunes.
